container-title: CSI was formed in 1982 to ensure that U.S. trade in services, once considered outside the scope of U.S. trade negotiations, would become a central goal of future trade liberalization initiatives
title: The Global Services Coalition is a coalition of services industries such as the European Services Forum, the Australian Services Roundtable or the Coalition of Service Industries (CSI). As for the CSI, it is the leading business organization dedicated to the reduction of barriers to U.S. services exports, and to the development of constructive domestic U.S. policies, including tax policies that enhance the global competitiveness of its members
